title: Issues creating a Clash team

embed.description: Easily capture screenshots, GIFs, and replays that are ready to share. Download the free app for windows and mac.

body:
Hello LoL boards,

I'm trying to join, or start a Clash team with a few friends I play flex with occasionally.
Despite the fact that I have a solo/duo rank, I'm currently unable to even receive an invite from them, or start a team myself. When another player tries to invite me, they get the above issue. We've been trying to fix this all day, and are, as of yet, unable.

Does anyone have any issues,
current fixes are things like logging out and back in, client restarts, playing more games to try and force an update to my rank.

Any advice is greatly appreciated, esp as the time for locking is drawing mighty close.
